pageProduct.name: Pain Away Professional Ultra Joint Advanced 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Pain Away Professional Ultra Joint Advanced is a High strength formula effective for Joint Pain Relief. Formulated for the relief of symptoms of mild arthritis - Joint pain, joint inflammation, joint stiffness, joint swelling. Contains Clinically validated active ingredients that are effective for Joint Pain and Inflammation

Warnings

Derived from seafood. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Do not use if cap seal is broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Glucosamine Sulfate Sodium Chloride 1.2g (equiv. to Glucosamine Sulfate 955mg), Dimethyl Sulfone (MSM) 248.75mg, Boswellia Serrata Gum Oleoresin Dry 900mg, Celery Seed Dry (Apium Graveolens) 1.0g, Tumeric (Curcuma Longa Rhizome Dry) 1.5g (equiv. to Curcuminoids 48.75mg).

Directions

Take two tablets daily with food. If symptoms persist talk to your health professional.
